notes: regular -are verb; can be pronominal as 'fermarsi'
example_sentence_english: I need to stop the car.

notes: past participle; used with auxiliary avere; agrees when used adjectivally

example_sentence_english: You were stopping the car often.

translation_english: he was stopping/she was stopping/you (formal) were stopping
he has stopped/she has stopped/you (formal) have stopped
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
